articles.author: Siobhan Robbins
articles.title: Refugee trying to reach Europe shot near Bulgaria-Turkey border - Sky News
articles.content:
Bulgaria has been accused of shooting a refugee after a new video emerged showing a young Syrian man being fired at on the border with Turkey.
It is the first footage of an asylum seeker being hit w… [+6691 chars]

articles.title: Red Hot Chili Peppers unveil 2023 tour with opening night at BC Place - Entertainment News - Castanet.net
articles.description: There's no rest for the spicy: Fresh off a world tour and two albums this year, Red Hot Chili Peppers are preparing for a set of stadium shows and festival stops across North America and Europe in 2023.
